attributes.action: concern in the delay in leaving the EU and not adhering to the Referendum.
attributes.background:
This petition calls on people who believe in Brexit to withhold their votes in future elections, using all peaceful options to oppose this delay!
Parliament must adhere to the wishes of the majority and accept that BREXIT MEANS EXIT!
PLEASE ABSTAIN FROM VOTING & SIGN THIS PETITION ...

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

Any decision not to vote in elections would be a matter for individual voters.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions about leaving the EU, which you might like to sign. You're more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition. For example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
